name: admin.auth.policy.assignEntities
desc: Assign entities to a particular authentication policy.

entity_ids.desc: Array of IDs to assign to the policy.

entity_type.desc: The type of entity to assign to the policy. Currently, `USER` is supported.

policy_name.desc: The name of the authentication policy to assign the entities to. Currently, `email_password` is the only policy that may be used with this method.

errors.admin_unauthorized: The token provided doesn't have permission to revoke a session.
errors.entity_not_found: At least one `entity_id` was not found.
errors.feature_not_enabled: This method is only available for Enterprise organizations.
errors.internal_error: There was an internal error processing this requestâ€”please retry.
errors.invalid_arguments: Required arguments either were not provided or contain invalid values.
errors.invalid_auth: The token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by Org Owners and Admins.
errors.over_max_entity_limit: The number of entities assigned to this policy has reached its upper limit.
errors.policy_not_found: The policy name doesn't match any of the existing org policies.
errors.ratelimited: The rate limit for this endpoint has been reached.
errors.unknown_method: This method is currently not available.
